title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript client library for Node.js and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’).

title: open-webui
summary: Former ollama-webui; feature-rich, self-hosted AI interface supporting Ollama, OpenAI, etc.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with conversation memory.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with builder-style APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Next.js chat interface backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# .NET client for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with TypeScript declarations.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with generate/chat/embed endpoints and streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama enabling conversational AI in channels/DMs.
